Package tools.data.img.managed

Class ImageManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.data.img.managed.ImageManager
  • public final class ImageManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Function class for easier handeling of images.
    Applies dynamic loading of requested image sheets and unloads images sheets which were not used within the time limit.

    When an image sheet -- or a part of it -- is requested, then there are two possibilities:
    1. Case: The Sheet is loaded in memory.
      Action: The timer for that sheet is resetted the sheet is returned.
      Possible errors:
      • The image was not registered.
        Result: a NoSuchElementException is thrown.
    2. Case: The sheet is not loaded in memory.
      Action: The sheet is loaded in memory from the original image location, the timer is set and the sheet is returned.
      Possible errors:
      • The image was not registered.
        Result: a NoSuchElementException is thrown.
      • The original image location is not accessible.
        Result: a IllegalStateException is thrown with the IOException as source.

      • registerSheet

        public static java.lang.String registerSheet​(FileTree fileTree,
                                             java.lang.String path,
                                             int width,
                                             int height)
                                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Registers a image sheet for later use.
        Parameters:
        fileTree - The file tree to use.
        path - The path of the file inside the file tree.
        width - The width of each subimage.
        height - The height of each subimage.
        Returns:
        The ID of the sheet for later referencing.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given path doesn't exists.
        See Also:
        registerSheet(FileTree, String, int, int, int, int, int, int)

                                             int width,
                                             int height)
                                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Registers a image sheet for later use.
        Parameters:
        fileTree - The file tree to use.
        path - The path of the file inside the file tree.
        startX - The pixel x-coordinate of the start location in the image. (incl.)
        startY - The pixel y-coordinate of the start location in the image. (incl.)
        endX - The pixel x-coordinate of the end location of the image. (excl.)
        endY - The pixel y-coordinate of the end location of the image. (excl.)
        width - The width of each sub-image.
        height - The height of each sub-image.
        Returns:
        The ID of the sheet for later referencing.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given path doesn't exists.

      • getImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage​(java.lang.String idName,
                                                    int x,
                                                    int y)
                                             throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                                                    java.util.NoSuchElementException
        Returns a of the image which is located at the coordinates (x, y) at the image sheet with the given ID.
        Parameters:
        idName - The ID of the sheet.
        x - The x-coord of the image to be returned.
        y - The y-coord of the image to be returned.
        Returns:
        The image on the image sheet with the given ID at the coordinatess (x, y).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given x and y lie outside the range of the sheet.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the sheet could not be loaded, or if the loaded sheet contains less than 1 image.
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - If the sheet was not yet registered.

      • getHoriImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage getHoriImage​(java.lang.String idName,
                                                        int i)
        Returns the image of the sheet with the given ID and which is at the given index when linearizing the sheet to a single column.
        Parameters:
        idName - The id name of the sheet.
        i - The index for horizontal retrieval of the image.
        Returns:
        The image at the sheet denoted by idName at index i, where the 2D array is checked left to right, then up to down.
        See Also:
        for getting an image the other way around., for getting an image by direct x- and y-coords.

      • getVertImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage getVertImage​(java.lang.String idName,
                                                        int i)
        Returns the image of the sheet with the given ID and which is at the given index when linearizing the sheet to a single row.
        Parameters:
        idName - The id name of the sheet.
        i - The index for vertical retrieval of the image.
        Returns:
        The image at the sheet denoted by idName at index i, where the 2D array is checked left to up to down, then left to right.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given i lies outside the range of the sheet.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the sheet could not be loaded, or if the loaded sheet contains less than 1 image.
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - If the sheet was not yet registered.
        See Also:
        for getting an image the other way around., for getting an image by direct x- and y-coords.
